Class HttpWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • io.parallec.core.actor.HttpWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class HttpWorker
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    This is an akka actor with async http client.

    Yuanteng (Jeff) Pei
